name: AskWinston (Techstars '20)
description: AskWinston is your personal home assistant, we bring the hotel concierge experience to your home. With AskWinston families can save time as their home assistant helps to coordinate and manage any home service they would like to set up or request.

team.title: Managing Director
team.name: James Harbridge
team.bioHtml: Our mission is to create a world where every service you need is one message away. Co-Founder @AskWinston (Techstars '20)

jobs.title: Marketing Coordinator (Part-time)
jobs.description:
We are on a mission to create a world where every service you is one message away. Today, we support apartment buildings with our messaging channel, which lets residents request any home service by simply sending us a WhatsApp. This is an opportunity to join a fast-moving technology startup  that is scaling across London. 

Our service has launched in a series of buildings in London and we have a loyal user base who enjoy using our channel to get things done around their home. We are now looking for a marketing superstar who believes in our mission and would like to join our team in a part-time capacity to help us spread the word about AskWinston. 

The Role
- Help to coordinate physical marketing campaigns in existing and new apartment buildings 
- Flyer customers at new building launches and existing buildings
- Speak about AskWinston on our marketing stands inside apartment buildings and at events
- Help to formulate strategies that will be used to spread our message

Skills/ Requirements:
- Great verbal communication skills
- Flexible, approachable attitude with good problem-solving skills
- Good relationship-builder, and stakeholder engagement
- Eager to learn
- Desirable experience working with online and offline media
- Strong desire to work in a fast-moving start-up


This role will help you to expand your marketing knowledge, learn guerilla marketing techniques first-hand, and provide the opportunity to solve unique problems. You will be helping with our marketing efforts that acquire new customers, launch new buildings, and spread the word about AskWinston. 

If you are looking for a serious challenge and the opportunity to help us achieve our mission then this might be the right time to click apply. We would love to hear  why you would like to join us and hopefully we can build something great together.

jobs.title: Technology Lead
jobs.description:
Why AskWinston?

At AskWinston, we are on a mission to create a world where every service is one message away. We believe requesting services is painful - consumers browse endless reviews, create accounts, fill out forms, and manage services across multiple different platforms and apps. Our vision is to create one channel that consumers can trust to get everything done around home by simply sending a message or voice command! 

Today, we support apartment buildings with our messaging channel, which lets residents request any home service by sending us a WhatsApp. We’ve tested our solution by launching in a series of buildings in London and have iteratively improved our value proposition through listening to user feedback. We are now looking for a technology superstar who believes in our vision and would like to join our team to create something special. 

The scale of the opportunity ahead of us is vast, with a global home services market valued at £1.5 trillion and billions of consumers who experience a painful process every day. By joining our team, you will be able to build the foundations of our product and help to create a world-class technology team. 

Help us to revolutionise how consumers request services and create the default layer that will support the home of the future!


The Role

- Help to build our full-stack technology team to ensure optimal experience for customers, service provider, and our operations team
- Lead the development of the back-end technology for our in-house multi-messaging channel management system
- Take part in decisions related to how we undertake new projects
- Help with decisions about our technology roadmap

*You will be working alongside our current Product Lead 

Skills/ Requirements

- Pride in readable, well-designed, well-tested software
- 2+ years professional experience writing web-based applications in any language
- Experience with relational databases (PostGreSQL, MySQL) and key-value stores (Memcache, Redis)
- Experience developing, deploying, and maintaining API integrations
- Experience solving logistical problems with software


Culture

We admire bold thinkers who are passionate but humble enough to listen to others perspective. By being radically transparent we get to root cause of things and openly solve the difficult problems we are faced with on a daily basis. We accept our failures and building upon the learnings so that we can continue to grow. To enjoy our culture, you should be self-sufficient, tenacious, resourceful, and ready to endure the ebb and flow of startup life. 


Benefits

We believe that prioritising our team’s welfare is crucial to building a successful business. As part of the team, we offer protected hours throughout the week to focus on your personal development, wellbeing, and the other things in life that are important to you. We have a flexible work culture and encourage our team to spend at least one day a week avoiding their commute to prove we can all be productive working from home. We believe everybody should have equity in the business so we can align to solve a common goal and share in the company’s success. 

If you are looking for a serious challenge and the opportunity to build game-changing technology then please apply. We would love to hear about your vision of the future home, why you would like to join AskWinston, and hopefully we can build something great together!
